name: Social Media Links for Ultimate Member
author: SuitePlugins

sections.description:
Great easy to use plugin to add your social media accounts to your Ultimate Member profile.

= Available Social Networks=

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • LinkedIn
  • Xing
  • Renren
  • Google+
  • Whatsapp
  • Tumblr
  • Pinterest
  • Youtube
  • VK
  • Vine
  • Website

Other Ultimate Member Plugins

SuitePlugins is on the verge of creating some great addons for Ultimate Member. Here are a few that you may want to check out

  • Gallery – The best photo and video album gallery extension for Ultimate Member.
  • Docs – Let users upload files that can be seen publicly or privately
  • Stories – Allow users to have a journal or mini-blog from their profile.
  • Visitors – Visitors allow users to see others that have visited their profile
  • Relationships – Allow users to select family members and display them on their profile

Free Extensions

  • Login Widget for Ultimate Member – Easily add a login widget that works with Ultimate Member
  • Gallery for Ultimate Member – Easy to use Image Gallery for Ultimate Member. Taking UM Photos to a next level
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract the zip archive
  2. Upload social-links-for-ultimate-member folder to /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release.

1.0.1

  • Fixed: Issue with removing links
  • Updated: license.txt was empty. Added GPL license
  • Updated: readme.txt

1.0.2

  • Restricted Social Network tab to owner only
  • Added option to manage user’s fields from admin
  • Added Website as a field option
